Events that occurred on 11 May

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1922 - A Middle English Vocabulary, Tolkien's first book, is published.
1931 - Artist Angus McBride is born.
1944 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 67.
1980 - The animated film The Return of the King is first aired in the US.
1997 - Final day of Bree Moot 3 in Minneapolis.
2001 - Kinder Surprise begins its Lord of the Rings promotion in Germany.

content.title: In Arda
content.content: There are no known events for this day.
